title: SSC Survey Results 2018
summary:
Key ideas:
- A survey conducted by Scott (author) had 8,077 participants.
- The survey page has changed this year and participants just have to press "okay" and "submit" to view the results.
- The survey results are available for viewing.
- Longer analyses will be posted later.

Key learnings:
- The results of the survey can be viewed by just pressing "okay" and "submit".
- The data from the responses is available for download.

Key questions:
- None mentioned in this portion of the blog post.
